TCName.name: CreatingOrderOnReceipt
TCName.ArtDet: select a.matnr,a.ORDER_UOM, f.store_soh, f.STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT, convert(Double, c.ARTICLE_OM) || ' ' || e.meins as OM, convert(Double, c.ARTICLE_OM),c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, c.IS_CPBD, d.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, d.pbd_ind, e.meins, c.PI_OM, b.Name1 || ' (' || a.lifnr || ')', d.TEMPERATURE_IND from zwowc_art_list_procure a JOIN ZWOWC_SUPPLIER_DETAILS b ON a.lifnr = b.supplier JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c ON a.matnr = c.MATNR JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER d ON c.matnr = d.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM e ON d.matnr = e.matnr JOIN LOCAL_WOW_SOH f ON e.matnr = f.article where a.matnr = 'art_no' and a.prime_vendor_flg = 'Y' and e.BASE_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.SOHSQL: select store_soh, STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT from local_wow_soh where article = 'art_no'
TCName.CPBDArticle: select MATNR from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE = 'art_no' and COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_OM = '24'
TCName.usernm: select COALESCE(COALESCE(PREFERRED_NAME,FIRST_NAME)||' '||LAST_NAME, 'userid') AS RECV_USER from usr where usr_id = 'userid'
TCName.Tempflg: select Temperature_ind from ZWOWO_PO_HDR where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.DelDraft: delete from LOCAL_WOW_DRAFT_ORDER where draft_type='POR' and create_user = 'userid';commit;

TCName.OrdDet: select PITM.MATNR, convert(DOUBLE,PITM.ARTICLE_OM)|| ' ' || art_uom.meinh as OM, convert(DOUBLE,PITM.MENGE) || ' ' || PITM.MEINS as qty , convert(DOUBLE,PITM.ARTICLE_OM)*convert(DOUBLE,PITM.MENGE) || ' ' || art_uom.meinh as TotalUnits, convert(DOUBLE,PITM.MENGE) * convert(DOUBLE,ZAL.PI_OM) || ' EA' as randWtOM, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, ZAL.IS_CPBD,ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, PITM.MEINS, ZAL.PI_OM, PITM.ARTICLE_OM, art_uom.meinh FROM ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM --JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM OPTM ON (PITM.EBELN = OPTM.EBELN and PITM.EBELP=OPTM.EBELP) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) join ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM art_uom on (ZAL.MATNR=art_uom.matnr) WHERE PITM.EBELN = 'ord_no' and ART_UOM.base_uom_ind = 'Y';

TCName.DispArt: select distinct a.MATNR, convert(DOUBLE,sum(a.ARTICLE_QTY))|| ' '|| a.MEINS, convert(DOUBLE,sum(a.ARTICLE_QTY)), a.MEINS, 1 from ZWOWO_ORDER_COMPONENT a join ZWOWC_ARTICLE_listing ZAM ON (a.matnr = ZAM.matnr) group by a.MATNR, a.ebeln, a.display_article, a.order_type,a.MEINS,ZAM.article_om having a.ebeln = 'ord_no' and a.display_article = 'art_no'
TCName.usernm: select COALESCE(COALESCE(PREFERRED_NAME,FIRST_NAME)||' '||LAST_NAME, 'userid') AS RECV_USER from usr where usr_id = 'userid'
TCName.Tempflg: select Temperature_ind from ZWOWO_PO_HDR where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.RecvngDet: select a.mblnr,a.lfbnr,count(*),sum(a.MENGE) as tot_recv_qty,sum(a.RND_WGT) as tot_rnd_wgt,a.chilled_temp,a.frozen_temp,a.xabln,COALESCE(COALESCE(b.PREFERRED_NAME,b.FIRST_NAME)||' '||b.LAST_NAME, a.recv_user), dateformat(a.budat || ' ' || a.recv_time,'dd/mm/yyyy hh:nn:ss') as recv_date_time from LOCAL_RECEIVING_INFO a, usr b group by a.mblnr,a.lfbnr,a.ebeln,a.display_article,a.chilled_temp,a.xabln,b.usr_nm,a.frozen_temp,a.recv_time,a.budat,a.recv_user,b.usr_id,b.LAST_NAME,b.FIRST_NAME,b.PREFERRED_NAME having ebeln = 'ord_no' and b.usr_id = a.recv_user and a.display_article = ''
TCName.RecvArtDet: select * from (select LRI.matnr, convert(DOUBLE,LRI.MENGE) || ' ' || LRI.MEINH as recvd_qty, convert(DOUBLE, LRI.MENGE) * convert(DOUBLE, LRI.RECV_OM) || ' ' || art_uom.meinh as Tot_rec_units, convert(DOUBLE,LRI.RND_WGT) || ' ' || art_uom.meinh as WGT, convert(DOUBLE, LRI.RND_WGT_QTY) || ' EA' as recv_PIQTY,convert(DOUBLE, LRI.RECV_OM) || ' ' || art_uom.meinh as RECV_OM, LRI.display_article, LRI.DISPLAY_IND, convert(DOUBLE, LRI.MENGE) * convert(DOUBLE, LRI.RECV_OM) as RecvdUnits, convert(DOUBLE,LRI.RND_WGT) as RND_WGT, convert(DOUBLE, LRI.RND_WGT_QTY) as RND_WGT_QTY, convert(DOUBLE, ZAL.PI_OM) as PI_OM, LRI.MEINH, convert(DOUBLE, LRI.RECV_OM) as RECV_OM1, RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY LRI.MATNR ORDER BY LRI.LastUpdatedAtPlantTS DESC) as time1 from ZWOWO_MDOC_ITM LRI --JOIN saap.O_MDOC_ITM OITM ON( OITM.mblnr = LRI.mblnr and oitm.mjahr=lri.mjahr and oitm.zeile = lri.zeile) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (LRI.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (LRI.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) join ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM art_uom on (ZAL.MATNR=art_uom.matnr) WHERE LRI.LFBNR = 'ord_no' and ART_UOM.base_uom_ind = 'Y')A where a.time1 = '1'
TCName.TransID: select distinct transid from zwowt_mdoc_itm where lfbnr = 'ord_no'
TCName.DelEntries: delete from zwowt_mdoc_itm where transid = 'transid1';delete from zwowt_mdochd where transid = 'transid1';delete from t_mdoc_itm where transid = 'transid1';delete from t_mdochd where transid = 'transid1';commit;

TCName.TotCart: select sum(s.dispqty), sum(s.disptotalqty1) from (select a.matnr, d.MEINH,a.VRKME,convert(double, sum(a.lfimg)) as dispqty, case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) ELSE convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) END as disptotalqty, max(a.OM_SIZE) as OM1,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, b.TEMPERATURE_IND, case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT=0.000 THEN convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) ELSE 0 END as disptotalqty1 from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_uom d on c.matnr = d.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG,b.TEMPERATURE_IND,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT,base_uom_ind,d.meinh having a.vbeln = 'ord_no' and d.base_uom_ind = 'Y') as s;

TCName.Artdet: select a.matnr, a.MEINS,a.VRKME,sum(a.lfimg), case when sum(a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) > 0.00 THEN sum(a.zzdespatch_weight) else sum(a.lgmng) end as dispatchweight, max(a.OM_SIZE),b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, b.TEMPERATURE_IND from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, b.TEMPERATURE_IND having a.vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.OrdDet: SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS "DELIVERY",LONH.MSG_TYPE AS "STATUS",PITM.MATNR AS "ARTICLE",SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS "ORDER QUANTITY", PITM.MEINS AS "ARTICLE UOM",MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS "ON SHOW DATE",ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS "RANDOM WEIGHT FLAG", ZAL.PI_OM,PITM.ARTICLE_OM, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, PHDR.TEMPERATURE_IND FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no';
TCName.OrdCar: SELECT DISTINCT A.DELIVERY AS "DELIVERY", SUM(A.ORDER_QUANTITY) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "TOTAL ORDER QUANTITY", MAX(convert(char(12), A.ON_SHOW_DATE, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "ON SHOW DATE", MAX(convert(char(12), A.LFDAT, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "DELIVERY DATE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS DELIVERY, LONH.MSG_TYPE AS STATUS, PITM.MATNR AS ARTICLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, PITM.MEINS AS ARTICLE_UOM, MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS ON_SHOW_DATE,MAX(PHDR.LFDAT) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS LFDAT, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLAG FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A;

TCName.OrdCar: SELECT DISTINCT A.DELIVERY AS "DELIVERY", SUM(A.ORDER_QUANTITY) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "TOTAL ORDER QUANTITY", MAX(convert(char(12), A.ON_SHOW_DATE, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "ON SHOW DATE", MAX(convert(char(12), A.LFDAT, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "DELIVERY DATE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS DELIVERY, LONH.MSG_TYPE AS STATUS, PITM.MATNR AS ARTICLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, PITM.MEINS AS ARTICLE_UOM, MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS ON_SHOW_DATE,MAX(PHDR.LFDAT) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS LFDAT, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLAG FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A;

TCName.name: ReceivingOrderFullWarehousebyAcceptingNotRangedArticles
TCName.OrderDetails: select vbeln, convert(char(12), convert(date, podat), 103), convert(char(12), convert(date, podat), 103), created_by, lifnr from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR where vbeln ='ord_no'
TCName.Whsename: select NAME1 from ZWOWC_SITE_MASTER where werks = 'DC_no'
TCName.TotCart: select sum(s.dispqty), sum(s.disptotalqty1) from (select a.matnr, d.MEINH,a.VRKME,convert(double, sum(a.lfimg)) as dispqty, case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) ELSE convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) END as disptotalqty, max(a.OM_SIZE) as OM1,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, b.TEMPERATURE_IND, case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT=0.000 THEN convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) ELSE 0 END as disptotalqty1 from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_uom d on c.matnr = d.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG,b.TEMPERATURE_IND,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT,base_uom_ind,d.meinh having a.vbeln = 'ord_no' and d.base_uom_ind = 'Y') as s;
TCName.TotArt: select count(distinct matnr) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM where vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Artcount: select sum(a.LFIMG), count(distinct a.matnr) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a, ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAM where a.vBELN = 'ord_no' and a.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR
TCName.Artdet: select a.matnr, a.MEINS,a.VRKME,sum(a.lfimg), sum(a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT), max(a.OM_SIZE),b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, c.ALC_STATUS from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, c.ALC_STATUS having a.vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.OrdDet: SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS "DELIVERY",LONH.MSG_TYPE AS "STATUS",PITM.MATNR AS "ARTICLE",SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS "ORDER QUANTITY", PITM.MEINS AS "ARTICLE UOM",MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS "ON SHOW DATE",ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS "RANDOM WEIGHT FLAG", ZAL.PI_OM,PITM.ARTICLE_OM, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, PHDR.TEMPERATURE_IND FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no';
TCName.OrdCar: SELECT DISTINCT A.DELIVERY AS "DELIVERY", SUM(A.ORDER_QUANTITY) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "TOTAL ORDER QUANTITY", MAX(convert(char(12), A.ON_SHOW_DATE, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "ON SHOW DATE", MAX(convert(char(12), A.LFDAT, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "DELIVERY DATE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS DELIVERY, LONH.MSG_TYPE AS STATUS, PITM.MATNR AS ARTICLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, PITM.MEINS AS ARTICLE_UOM, MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS ON_SHOW_DATE,MAX(PHDR.LFDAT) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS LFDAT, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLAG FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A;
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.SOHSQL: select store_soh, STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT from local_wow_soh where article = 'art_no'
TCName.CPBDArticle: select MATNR from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE = 'art_no' and COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_OM = '24'
TCName.DispArt: select distinct MATNR, sum(ARTICLE_QTY),MEINS from ZWOWO_ORDER_COMPONENT group by MATNR, ebeln, display_article, order_type,MEINS having ebeln = 'ord_no' and display_article = 'art_no' and order_type = 'DSP'
TCName.usernm: select COALESCE(COALESCE(PREFERRED_NAME,FIRST_NAME)||' '||LAST_NAME, 'userid') AS RECV_USER from usr where usr_id = 'userid'

TCName.name: ReceivingOrderFullWarehouseSellable
TCName.OrderDetails: select vbeln, created_by, lifnr from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR where vbeln ='ord_no'
TCName.Whsename: select NAME1 from ZWOWC_SITE_MASTER where werks = 'DC_no'
TCName.TotCart: select sum(LFIMG), sum(ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT), count(distinct matnr) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM where vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.OrdDet:
SELECT DISTINCT A.POI_MATNR AS "Article", convert(double, POI_ARTICLE_OM)||' '||NIT_MEINS AS "OM", convert(double, SUM(POI_MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY POI_MATNR, NIT_VBELN, NIT_VRKME, POI_ARTICLE_OM))||' '||NIT_VRKME AS "Ordered Qty", convert(double, SUM(POI_MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY POI_MATNR, NIT_VBELN, NIT_VRKME, POI_ARTICLE_OM)) * POI_ARTICLE_OM||' '||NIT_MEINS AS "Ordered Total Units", convert(double, SUM(NIT_LFIMG) OVER (PARTITION BY POI_MATNR, NIT_VBELN, NIT_VRKME, POI_ARTICLE_OM))||' '||NIT_VRKME AS "Dispatched Qty", convert(double, SUM(NIT_LFIMG) OVER (PARTITION BY POI_MATNR, NIT_VBELN, NIT_VRKME, POI_ARTICLE_OM)) * POI_ARTICLE_OM||' '||NIT_MEINS AS "Dispatched Total Units" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT POI.MENGE AS POI_MENGE, POI.MATNR AS POI_MATNR, POI.EBELP AS POI_EBELP, POI.EBELN AS POI_EBELN, SUM(NIT.LFIMG) OVER (PARTITION BY POI.EBELN,POI.EBELP_TRIM ) AS NIT_LFIMG, NIT.MATNR AS NIT_MATNR, NIT.MEINS AS NIT_MEINS, NIT.VRKME AS NIT_VRKME, POI.ARTICLE_OM AS POI_ARTICLE_OM, NIT.VBELN AS NIT_VBELN
FROM ZWOWO_PO_HDR POH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM POI ON (POI.EBELN = POH.EBELN) -- JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM POI ON (POI.EBELN = POI.EBELN AND POI.EBELP=POI.EBELP) JOIN ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM NIT ON (POI.EBELN=NIT.VGBEL AND POI.MATNR=NIT.MATNR AND POI.ebelp_trim=NIT.vgpos_trim) JOIN ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR NHD ON (NIT.VBELN = NHD.VBELN) WHERE NHD.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A ORDER BY A.POI_MATNR;
TCName.OrdCar: SELECT DISTINCT A.DELIVERY AS "DELIVERY", SUM(A.ORDER_QUANTITY) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "TOTAL ORDER QUANTITY", MAX(convert(char(12), A.ON_SHOW_DATE, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "ON SHOW DATE", MAX(convert(char(12), A.LFDAT, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "DELIVERY DATE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS DELIVERY, LONH.MSG_TYPE AS STATUS, PITM.MATNR AS ARTICLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, PITM.MEINS AS ARTICLE_UOM, MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS ON_SHOW_DATE,MAX(PHDR.LFDAT) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS LFDAT, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLAG FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A;
TCName.TotArt:
select count(*) from (SELECT DISTINCT A.POI_MATNR AS "Article", convert(double, SUM(NIT_LFIMG) OVER (PARTITION BY POI_MATNR, NIT_VBELN, NIT_VRKME)) * POI_ARTICLE_OM AS "Dispatched_Total_Units" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT POI.MENGE AS POI_MENGE, POI.MATNR AS POI_MATNR, POI.EBELP AS POI_EBELP, POI.EBELN AS POI_EBELN, SUM(NIT.LFIMG) OVER (PARTITION BY POI.EBELN,POI.EBELP_TRIM ) AS NIT_LFIMG, NIT.MATNR AS NIT_MATNR, NIT.MEINS AS NIT_MEINS, NIT.VRKME AS NIT_VRKME, POI.ARTICLE_OM AS POI_ARTICLE_OM, NIT.VBELN AS NIT_VBELN
FROM ZWOWO_PO_HDR POH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM POI ON (POI.EBELN = POH.EBELN) --JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM POI ON (POI.EBELN = POI.EBELN AND POI.EBELP=POI.EBELP) JOIN ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM NIT ON (POI.EBELN=NIT.VGBEL AND POI.MATNR=NIT.MATNR AND POI.ebelp_trim=NIT.vgpos_trim) JOIN ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR NHD ON (NIT.VBELN = NHD.VBELN) WHERE NHD.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A ORDER BY A.POI_MATNR) B;
TCName.SOHSQL: select store_soh, STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT from local_wow_soh where article = 'art_no'
TCName.usernm: select COALESCE(COALESCE(PREFERRED_NAME,FIRST_NAME)||' '||LAST_NAME, 'userid') AS RECV_USER from usr where usr_id = 'userid'
TCName.Tempflg: select Temperature_ind from ZWOWO_PO_HDR where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.SOHDisp:
select distinct b.Article, sum(b.Dispatched_Total_Units) from (SELECT DISTINCT A.POI_MATNR AS "Article", convert(double, SUM(NIT_LFIMG) OVER (PARTITION BY POI_MATNR, NIT_VBELN, NIT_VRKME, POI_ARTICLE_OM)) * POI_ARTICLE_OM AS "Dispatched_Total_Units", NIT_MEINS FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT POI.MENGE AS POI_MENGE, POI.MATNR AS POI_MATNR, POI.EBELP AS POI_EBELP, POI.EBELN AS POI_EBELN, SUM(NIT.LFIMG) OVER (PARTITION BY POI.EBELN,POI.EBELP_TRIM ) AS NIT_LFIMG, NIT.MATNR AS NIT_MATNR, NIT.MEINS AS NIT_MEINS, NIT.VRKME AS NIT_VRKME, POI.ARTICLE_OM AS POI_ARTICLE_OM, NIT.VBELN AS NIT_VBELN
FROM ZWOWO_PO_HDR POH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM POI ON (POI.EBELN = POH.EBELN) --JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM POI ON (POI.EBELN = POI.EBELN AND POI.EBELP=POI.EBELP) JOIN ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM NIT ON (POI.EBELN=NIT.VGBEL AND POI.MATNR=NIT.MATNR AND POI.ebelp_trim=NIT.vgpos_trim) JOIN ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR NHD ON (NIT.VBELN = NHD.VBELN) WHERE NHD.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A ORDER BY A.POI_MATNR) B group by b.Article;

TCName.name: ReceivingSingleSegmentOrderFull
TCName.SegDel: select vbeln from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR where lifex like '%ord_no%' and vbeln <> 'ord_no'
TCName.OrderDetails: select a.vbeln, a.created_by, b.NAME1 || ' (' || b.werks || ')' as supplier from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR a,ZWOWC_SITE_MASTER b where a.vbeln ='ord_no' and a.lifnr = b.werks
TCName.TotCart: select sum(LFIMG), sum(ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT), count(distinct matnr) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM where vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.OrdDet: SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS "DELIVERY",LONH.MSG_TYPE AS "STATUS",PITM.MATNR AS "ARTICLE",convert(DOUBLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS)) || ' '||PITM.MEINS AS "ORDER QUANTITY", ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS "RANDOM WEIGHT FLAG",convert(DOUBLE, PITM.ARTICLE_OM) || ' '|| ZAU.MEINS as OM, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, PHDR.TEMPERATURE_IND, convert(DOUBLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS)) * convert(DOUBLE, PITM.ARTICLE_OM) || ' '|| ZAU.MEINS as TotOrdQTy, convert(DOUBLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS)) * convert(DOUBLE, PITM.ARTICLE_OM) || ' '|| ZAU.MEINS || ' (' || convert(DOUBLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS)) * convert(DOUBLE, ZAL.PI_OM) || ' EA)' as OrdWgt, convert(DOUBLE, ZAL.PI_OM) as piom FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM ZAU ON (ZAU.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' and ZAU.base_uom_ind = 'Y';
TCName.OrdCar: SELECT DISTINCT A.DELIVERY AS "DELIVERY", SUM(A.ORDER_QUANTITY) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "TOTAL ORDER QUANTITY", MAX(convert(char(12), A.ON_SHOW_DATE, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "ON SHOW DATE", convert(char(12), convert(date,A.podat), 103) AS "DELIVERY DATE", MAX(convert(char(12), A.LFDAT, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "Delivery DATE1" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS DELIVERY, LONH.MSG_TYPE AS STATUS, PITM.MATNR AS ARTICLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, PITM.MEINS AS ARTICLE_UOM, MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS ON_SHOW_DATE,MIN(PHDR.LFDAT) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS LFDAT, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLAG, ZONH.PODAT as PODAT FROM ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR ZONH JOIN LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH ON (ZONH.VBELN = LONH.VBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A;
TCName.Disp_det: select PITM.vbeln,PITM.matnr,convert(DOUBLE,sum(PITM.lfimg))||' '||PITM.VRKME as dspqty, convert(double, case when sum(PITM.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) > 0.00 THEN sum(PITM.zzdespatch_weight) else sum(PITM.lgmng) end) || ' '|| PITM.MEINS as dsptotqty, convert(DOUBLE,sum(PITM.lfimg)), convert(DOUBLE,sum(PITM.lgmng)), sum(PITM.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT), convert(DOUBLE,sum(PITM.lfimg)) * ZAL.PI_OM as PI_QTY, convert(DOUBLE, sum(PITM.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT)) || ' '|| PITM.MEINS || ' (' || convert(DOUBLE,sum(PITM.lfimg)) * ZAL.PI_OM || ' EA)' as dspwgt, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM PITM JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (ZAM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) group by PITM.vbeln, PITM.matnr,PITM.vrkme,PITM.meins, ZAL.PI_OM, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG having PITM.vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.SOHSQL: select store_soh, STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT from local_wow_soh where article = 'art_no'
TCName.CPBDArticle: select MATNR from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE = 'art_no' and COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_OM = '24'
TCName.DispArt: select distinct MATNR, sum(ARTICLE_QTY),MEINS from ZWOWO_ORDER_COMPONENT group by MATNR, ebeln, display_article, order_type,MEINS having ebeln = 'ord_no' and display_article = 'art_no' and order_type = 'DSP'
TCName.usernm: select COALESCE(COALESCE(PREFERRED_NAME,FIRST_NAME)||' '||LAST_NAME, 'userid') AS RECV_USER from usr where usr_id = 'userid'

TCName.name: ReceivingOrderFullVendorASN
TCName.VBELN: select vbeln,ebeln from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_hdr where lifex = 'ord_no'
TCName.OrderDetails: select lifex, convert(char(12), convert(date, lfdat), 103), convert(char(12), convert(date, podat), 103), created_by, lifnr from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR where vbeln ='ord_no'
TCName.Whsename: select NAME1,SUPPLIER from ZWOWC_SUPPLIER_DETAILS where supplier = 'vendor_no'
TCName.TotCart: select sum(s.dispqty), sum(s.disptotalqty1) from (select a.matnr, d.MEINH,a.VRKME,convert(double, sum(a.lfimg)) as dispqty, case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) ELSE convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) END as disptotalqty, max(a.OM_SIZE) as OM1,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, b.TEMPERATURE_IND, case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT=0.000 THEN convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) ELSE 0 END as disptotalqty1 from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_uom d on c.matnr = d.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG,b.TEMPERATURE_IND,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT,base_uom_ind,d.meinh having a.vbeln = 'ord_no' and d.base_uom_ind = 'Y') as s;
TCName.TotArt: select count(distinct matnr) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM where vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Artcount: select sum(a.LFIMG), count(distinct a.matnr) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a, ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM where a.vBELN = 'ord_no' and a.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR;
TCName.Artdet: select a.matnr, d.MEINH,a.VRKME,sum(a.lfimg), case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) ELSE convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) END as disptotalqty, max(a.OM_SIZE),b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, b.TEMPERATURE_IND from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_uom d on c.matnr = d.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG,b.TEMPERATURE_IND,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT,base_uom_ind,d.meinh having a.vbeln = 'ord_no' and d.base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.OrdDet: SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS "DELIVERY",LONH.MSG_TYPE AS "STATUS",PITM.MATNR AS "ARTICLE",SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS "ORDER QUANTITY", PITM.MEINS AS "ARTICLE UOM",MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS "ON SHOW DATE",ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS "RANDOM WEIGHT FLAG", ZAL.PI_OM,PITM.ARTICLE_OM, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, PHDR.TEMPERATURE_IND FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no';
TCName.OrdCar: SELECT DISTINCT A.DELIVERY AS "DELIVERY", SUM(A.ORDER_QUANTITY) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "TOTAL ORDER QUANTITY", MAX(convert(char(12), A.ON_SHOW_DATE, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "ON SHOW DATE", MAX(convert(char(12), A.LFDAT, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "DELIVERY DATE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS DELIVERY, LONH.MSG_TYPE AS STATUS, PITM.MATNR AS ARTICLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, PITM.MEINS AS ARTICLE_UOM, MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS ON_SHOW_DATE,MAX(PHDR.LFDAT) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS LFDAT, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLAG FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A;

TCName.name: ReceivingOrderVendorASNLineByLinevthHighTemp
TCName.VBELN: select vbeln,ebeln from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_hdr where lifex = 'ord_no'
TCName.OrderDetails: select lifex, convert(char(12), convert(date, lfdat), 103), convert(char(12), convert(date, podat), 103), created_by, lifnr from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR where vbeln ='ord_no'
TCName.Artcount: select count (distinct a.matnr) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a, ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM where a.vBELN = 'ord_no' and a.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR and ZAM.TEMPERATURE_IND in ('03', '01') and ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND <> 'Y'
TCName.Whsename: select NAME1,SUPPLIER from ZWOWC_SUPPLIER_DETAILS where supplier = 'vendor_no'
TCName.TotCart: select sum(s.dispqty), sum(s.disptotalqty1) from (select a.matnr, d.MEINH,a.VRKME,sum(a.lfimg) as dispqty, case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) ELSE convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) END as disptotalqty, max(a.OM_SIZE) as OM1,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, b.TEMPERATURE_IND, case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT=0.000 THEN convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) ELSE 0 END as disptotalqty1 from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_uom d on c.matnr = d.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG,b.TEMPERATURE_IND,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT,base_uom_ind,d.meinh having a.vbeln = 'ord_no' and d.base_uom_ind = 'Y') as s;
TCName.TotArt: select count(distinct matnr) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM where vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Artdet: select a.matnr, d.MEINH,a.VRKME,sum(a.lfimg), case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) ELSE convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) END as disptotalqty, max(a.OM_SIZE),b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, b.TEMPERATURE_IND,c.PI_OM,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_uom d on c.matnr = d.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG,b.TEMPERATURE_IND,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT,base_uom_ind,d.meinh,c.PI_OM having a.vbeln = 'ord_no' and d.base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.OrdDet: SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS "DELIVERY",LONH.MSG_TYPE AS "STATUS",PITM.MATNR AS "ARTICLE",SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS "ORDER QUANTITY", PITM.MEINS AS "ARTICLE UOM",MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS "ON SHOW DATE",ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS "RANDOM WEIGHT FLAG", ZAL.PI_OM,PITM.ARTICLE_OM, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, PHDR.TEMPERATURE_IND FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no';
TCName.OrdCar: SELECT DISTINCT A.DELIVERY AS "DELIVERY", SUM(A.ORDER_QUANTITY) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "TOTAL ORDER QUANTITY", MAX(convert(char(12), A.ON_SHOW_DATE, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "ON SHOW DATE", MAX(convert(char(12), A.LFDAT, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "DELIVERY DATE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS DELIVERY, LONH.MSG_TYPE AS STATUS, PITM.MATNR AS ARTICLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, PITM.MEINS AS ARTICLE_UOM, MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS ON_SHOW_DATE,MAX(PHDR.LFDAT) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS LFDAT, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLAG FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A;
TCName.SOHSQL: select store_soh, STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT from local_wow_soh where article = 'art_no'
TCName.CPBDArticle: select MATNR from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE = 'art_no' and COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_OM = '24'
TCName.DispArt: select distinct MATNR, sum(ARTICLE_QTY), MEINS from ZWOWO_ORDER_COMPONENT group by MATNR, ebeln, display_article, order_type, MEINS having ebeln = 'ord_no' and display_article = 'art_no' and order_type = 'ASN'
TCName.usernm: select COALESCE(COALESCE(PREFERRED_NAME,FIRST_NAME)||' '||LAST_NAME, 'userid') AS RECV_USER from usr where usr_id = 'userid'

TCName.VBELN: select vbeln,ebeln from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_hdr where lifex = 'ord_no'
TCName.OrderDetails: select lifex, convert(char(12), convert(date, lfdat), 103), convert(char(12), convert(date, podat), 103), created_by, lifnr from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR where vbeln ='ord_no'
TCName.Whsename: select NAME1,SUPPLIER from ZWOWC_SUPPLIER_DETAILS where supplier = 'vendor_no'
TCName.Artcount: select sum(a.LFIMG), count(distinct a.matnr) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a, ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAM where a.vBELN = 'ord_no' and a.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR and ZAM.ALC_STATUS <> 'DA' and ZAM.ALC_STATUS <> 'ES'
TCName.TotCart: select sum(s.dispqty), sum(s.disptotalqty1) from (select a.matnr, d.MEINH,a.VRKME,sum(a.lfimg) as dispqty, case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) ELSE convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) END as disptotalqty, max(a.OM_SIZE) as OM1,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, b.TEMPERATURE_IND, case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT=0.000 THEN convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) ELSE 0 END as disptotalqty1 from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_uom d on c.matnr = d.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG,b.TEMPERATURE_IND,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT,base_uom_ind,d.meinh having a.vbeln = 'ord_no' and d.base_uom_ind = 'Y') as s;
TCName.TotArt: select count(distinct matnr) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM where vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Artdet: select a.matnr, d.MEINH,a.VRKME,sum(a.lfimg), case when d.MEINH='KG' and c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) when c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT>0.000 THEN convert(double,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) ELSE convert(double,sum(a.lgmng)) END as disptotalqty, max(a.OM_SIZE),b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, c.ALC_STATUS,c.PI_OM from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_uom d on c.matnr = d.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,c.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG,b.TEMPERATURE_IND,a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT,base_uom_ind,d.meinh,c.alc_status,c.PI_OM having a.vbeln = 'ord_no' and d.base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.OrdDet: SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS "DELIVERY",LONH.MSG_TYPE AS "STATUS",PITM.MATNR AS "ARTICLE",SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS "ORDER QUANTITY", PITM.MEINS AS "ARTICLE UOM",MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS "ON SHOW DATE",ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS "RANDOM WEIGHT FLAG", ZAL.PI_OM,PITM.ARTICLE_OM, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, PHDR.TEMPERATURE_IND FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no';
TCName.OrdCar: SELECT DISTINCT A.DELIVERY AS "DELIVERY", SUM(A.ORDER_QUANTITY) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "TOTAL ORDER QUANTITY", MAX(convert(char(12), A.ON_SHOW_DATE, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "ON SHOW DATE", MAX(convert(char(12), A.LFDAT, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "DELIVERY DATE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS DELIVERY, LONH.MSG_TYPE AS STATUS, PITM.MATNR AS ARTICLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, PITM.MEINS AS ARTICLE_UOM, MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS ON_SHOW_DATE,MAX(PHDR.LFDAT) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS LFDAT, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLAG FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A;

TCName.CPBDArticle: select MATNR from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE = 'art_no' and COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_OM = '24'
TCName.DispArt: select distinct MATNR, sum(ARTICLE_QTY), MEINS from ZWOWO_ORDER_COMPONENT group by MATNR, ebeln, display_article, order_type, MEINS having ebeln = 'ord_no' and display_article = 'art_no' and order_type = 'ASN'
